thread.title: Travel Tips for a Safe Air Travel Trip - Travel Safety and Tips
thread.title_full: Travel Tips for a Safe Air Travel Trip - Travel Safety and Tips

author: By Arlene Fleming
title: Travel Tips for a Safe Air Travel Trip - Travel Safety and Tips
text: You've packed your luggage and planned your flight itinerary. Travel tips covering how to stay in contact, protect yourself in airports, etc. are considerations that should be a part of every air travel schedule. 1. Keep in Contact Phone numbers, flight itineraries, and keeping contacts updated are just a few elements of staying in contact. More » 2. Traveling Internationally Additional travel safety concerns and travel tips for international flights and travels. More » 3. Thwart Theft Theft is always a concern at airports, but also on flights. A few tips to make sure that your belongings aren't compromised. More » Share
